property.name: text
property.value: Two-robot open loop range-only localization of a stationary target. Robots 1 and 2 start their motion at coordinates {x=0,y=0} and {x=0,y=10} respectively and move according to their control input. The control input is provided such that the robots follow a circular orbit in opposite directions. The particles generated at each time step, which represent the estimated posterior distribution of the target location, are plotted.

entity.name: Gaussian
entity.doc: Create a sequence of gaussian random variables

entity.name: Gaussian
entity.doc: Create a sequence of gaussian random variables

property.name: legend
property.value: particles from robot1, robot1 position, target position, particles from robot2, robot2 position, location estimate
